thread.title: Yankees' CC Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
thread.title_full: Yankees' CC Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Yankees' CC Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
text:
Yankees' CC Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs Chicago White Sox v New York Yankees Jim McIsaac / Getty Images 
The Yankees' CC Sabathia pitches in the second inning against the White Sox. 
The Yankees' CC Sabathia pitches in the second inning against the White Sox. (Jim McIsaac / Getty Images) Yankees' CC Sabathia is checking into an alcohol rehabilitation center and will miss the postseason. 
Yankees pitcher CC Sabathia is checking into an alcohol rehabilitation center and will miss the postseason. 
The team released a statement from the pitcher Monday, a day before New York plays the Houston Astros in the AL wild-card game. 
Sabathia says he took the step to "receive the professional care and assistance needed to treat my disease." 
He adds: "It hurts me deeply to do this now, but I owe it to myself and to my family to get myself right. I want to take control of my disease." 
Sabathia says he intends to be back with the Yankees next season. 
Associated Press
